summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female victim (name redacted) conducted on September 18, 2019, in Los Angeles. The victim describes meeting Jeffrey Epstein through her sister at age 15, traveling to his New Mexico ranch, and experiencing sexual abuse by Epstein. The document details the grooming process, the abuse, and the presence of Ghislaine Maxwell and other associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexually abusing the victim. He paid for her school, arranged travel, and abused her at his New Mexico ranch.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Arrived at the New Mexico ranch by helicopter. Described as initially nice, then mean after her dog drowned. Epstein stated he used to date her.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Present as an attorney during the FBI interview of the victim.

persons.name: David Copperfield
persons.context: The victim was invited to his show in Las Vegas by Epstein's secretary, which was part of the initial travel arrangement.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Epstein asked the victim if her parents voted for him during a conversation on his private plane.

connections.description: Epstein told the victim he used to date Maxwell. Maxwell was present at his ranch.
Epstein's secretary contacted the victim's sister to arrange meetings and travel, indicating the sister was also involved with Epstein.
Maxwell was present at the ranch where the victim was staying. The victim observed Maxwell's behavior change after her dog drowned.
The secretary arranged travel, contacted the victim and her sister, and facilitated initial meetings with Epstein.
The photographer asked the victim sexual questions and gave her an unwanted, sexualized massage at the ranch.

events.title: Victim's High School Years and Initial Contact
events.description: The victim, aged 14-18, lived in Michigan. She first met Epstein in New York City at age 15 through her sister, who was staying at Epstein's house.

events.title: Trip to Las Vegas and New Mexico Ranch
events.description: At age 15, the victim traveled to Las Vegas to see a David Copperfield show and then to Epstein's ranch in New Mexico via his private plane. This is where the sexual abuse occurred.

events.title: Sexual Abuse at New Mexico Ranch
events.description: Epstein took the victim to his bedroom, exposed himself, used a vibrator on her, and took photos of her in lingerie. A red-headed photographer also gave her an unwanted sexual massage.

events.title: Victim Sees Epstein on TV in Rehab
events.description: The victim saw Jeffrey Epstein on television while she was in a rehabilitation facility.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed by the FBI in Los Angeles, with attorney Gloria Allred present, providing details of her abuse by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The victim was 15 years old when she was first groomed and later sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein at his New Mexico ranch.
Epstein's secretary played a key role in arranging travel and initial contact with the victim and her sister.
Ghislaine Maxwell was present at the New Mexico ranch; her demeanor changed after her dog drowned in a fountain.
Epstein gave the victim a $5,000 check to pay for her college after she expressed her educational aspirations.
The document records a detailed account of sexual abuse, including Epstein using a vibrator on the victim and taking photos of her in lingerie.
